title: Stagestruck 2
creator_credit: Bob Harvey, TLC Films and Spellcaster Productions
brief_description: A compilation of 4 separate episodes, this is the second of a series of three videos on everything you would like to know about theatre production and in particular, amateur theatre. Presented by Christina Barryk, aspects covered in this volume include: Pantomimes; School plays; Makeup techniques; Costume selection; Actors workshop and improvisation; Set design preparation for first rehearsal; Lighting; Prop designing, construction and tracking; Stage manager’s hints and tips for keeping the production on track. Also includes personal anecdotes interspersed throughout the program.
